file_content.text: What a waste. I had no idea Zylixx was so... imbalanced. You exposed his weakness so easily.
Your kind either fall to the dark or to a Sith's might.
All Jedi are weak.
Nomen Karr will prove those words false.
Zylixx would have revealed himself someday.
It was inevitable.
Perhaps you're right.
You have won the day, Sith. So, kill me if you must.
Inform Karr I will not be denied. He and his Padawan will fall to me.
Your wounds are my message.
Your mercy is... unexpected.
This violence is unnecessary. I only want to talk.
Tell Karr I mean no harm.
So curious. You leave me with much to ponder, Sith.
I'll convey the message.
I must.
Okay. [Kill Ulldin]
Time to join him in death.
No more talk. [Kill Ulldin]
May the Force... accept me....
Zylixx has fallen. I see it is futile to oppose you.
It seems we have company.
